offlinemot.post_process.postProcessAll

offlinemot.post_process.postProcessAll(tracks_objs)[source]

It loops over all the objects in the input list for post processing

Parameters

tracks_objs (list) – The list of all the taregts class objects

Returns

a list of the new post processed tracked objects

Return type

list

See also

post_process

perform post processing steps on the tracking data.
